casebody.data:
CHARLES BIERMAN, RELATOR, v. JAMES M. SEYMOUR ET AL. AND JOHN SCHUYLER ET AL. On rule to show cause for a mandamus.

Before Justices Van Syckel and Fort.

*127For the rule, James R. Nugent. For the mayor, Herbert Boggs. For the respondents, George F. Tuttle. Per Curiam.

For the reasons given in an opinion, filed at this present term, in Bierman v. Seymour and Shanley, a similar order for the court to issue in this case, as in that, will be made. The principle involved in both cases is the same.
